name: No Rest For The Gardener
description:
Welcome to your garden!  But wait... what is that weird looking plant...  OH! Well, that doesn't look that bad! It's just a... Okay now that's quite scary.  Fortunately you have this way too big and comically oversized pair of scissors!  I'm sure you can handle this! But be careful, you don't wanna spoil your beautiful flowers!

Special thanks to @german.mey on Instagram for providing the soundtrack of our game <3
